name.title: Name
name.description: A name for this collection of colours.

perRow.title: Colours Per Row
perRow.description: (optional) The maximum number of colours in a row when displayed in the picker. 0 or empty for unlimited.

compact.title: Compact Display
compact.description: Display colours without names, in a tightly packed format.

groups.title: Colour Groups
groups.description: Named groups of colours in the palette.

name.title: Group Name
name.description: A name for this colour group, used to filter relevant colours for a field. (eg. heading, background)

colors.title: Colours
colors.description: The colours to include in this palette.

color.title: Colour
color.description: The value of this colour. (hex colours can be pasted in, eg. #ff0000)
